skill100_1.tooltip: One More Time. So whenever you use a skill that has a hexagon-shaped icon, it can happen that a message like this appears, and it will instantly reset the cooldown of the corresponding skill.

skill100_2.tooltip: Blast. Use it on your base to activate War Fever mode, triggering a 60-second Blast countdown. The blast will damage nearby 3 base tiles, reducing their durability by 25%, Cooldown: 71.5 hours.

skill95_1.tooltip: Cooperative Construction II. Cooperative Construction Upgrade: Each level adds +5% construction speed boost (unlocks at Cooperative Construction max level), lasts 60 minutes, cooldown: 23,5 hours

skill95_2.tooltip: Cooperative Research II. Cooperative Research Upgrade: Each level adds +5% research speed boost (unlocks at Cooperative Research max level), lasts 60 minutes, cooldown: 23,5 hours

skill90_1.tooltip: Willing Helper. When helping allies, you earn an extra 50 Alliance Contribution Points (does not affect contribution rankings). Daily limit: 4 times (up to 20).

skill90_2.tooltip: Enhance Siege Banner. Upgrade the Siege Banner to gain an additional +10% rally and march speed {unlocks at Siege Banner max level), lasts 30 minutes, cooldown 71.5 hours (stacks up to 5 times).

skill90_3.tooltip: Summon Mummies. Target an unshielded enemy commander to summon a mummy boss near your base. The boss will march to attack the target for 30 minutes, cooldown 71.5 hours.

skill85_1.tooltip: Speedup Box. It grands 1 (up to 5) random speedup item(s). Cooldown: 23.5

skill85_2.tooltip: Emergency Capacity. Increase the capacity limit of the Emergency Center.

skill85_3.tooltip: Trade Discount. Enjoy extra discounts when purchasing items from Trade Posts.

skill80_1.tooltip: Truck Expansion. Increases the amount of Iron, Food, and Coins carried by the Truck by +5 % (up to ).

skill80_2.tooltip: Helping Hand. Increases the number of helps received by +1 (up to +5)

skill80_3.tooltip: Sandworm Trap. Deploy Sandworm Trap in your home warzone: the target will be entangled by the sandworm after triggering. Commanders from the same warzone and faction are immune. The trap lasts 24 hours with a 71.5-hour cooldown.

skill75_1.tooltip: Win-win Cooperation. Can only be used on the War Leader: Reduces their construction and tech research costs by 5% for 24 hours. Earn 1 rewards. Cooldown: 23.5 hours.

skill75_2.tooltip: Free Teleport. Gain one free Advanced Teleport chanceevery 71.5 hours, up to 1 (up to 3) stored at a time.

skill75_3.tooltip: Explosive Enhancement. The Desert Protector’s Death Shockwave ratio is increased.

skill70_1.tooltip: Instant Gathering. When used, all squads currently gathering at iron mines, farmland, or gold mines will immediately collect the remaining resources from the gathering tile and return (cannot exceed the squad’s load capacity). Cooldown: 119.5 hours (down to 23.5 hours). Only usable in your home warzone.

skill70_2.tooltip: Monster Tracking. Marching speed against monsters +5 % (up to 25 %)

skill70_3.tooltip: Indomitable Will. When Desert Protectors die during a march, 3% (up to 10%) of them regroup back at the base.

skill65_1.tooltip: Battlefield Cleanup. After defeating Ironhead, Glutton, Miser, and Doom Elites, the gain for Coin, Food, and Iron +2%

skill65_3.tooltip: Trap Landmines. Deploy a Trap Landmine on vacant area, targeting underground creatures. Position them in their path to force them above ground. Lasts for 10 minutes, cooldown 11.5 hours, stores up to 3.

skill60_2.tooltip: First Aid Expert. When defeated, the proportion entering the Emergency Center +1%

skill60_3.tooltip: Nature's Touch. Transforms a 9×9 tile area into green land (you may find uncover artifacts there). Can only be placed in areas that can be greenified and does not stack. Cooldown: 47.5 hours

skill55_1.tooltip: One More. The daily task points chest has a 5% (up to 25%) chance to double your rewards.

skill55_2.tooltip: Support Boost. Time helped per action +30 seconds ( up to 150 seconds)

skill55_3.tooltip: Sandstorm. Summon a sandstorm lasting 10 minutes. Within a 9×9 range, base troop march speed is reduced by 20%, cooldown 47.5 hours, and the area becomes desert terrain. This effect cannot stack.

skill50_1.tooltip: Random Visitors. Get 1 random survivor. 119.5 hours (down to 23.5 hours) cooldown

skill50_2.tooltip: Durability Mine. Deploy a [Durability Landmine] in the original Warzone. When triggered, it lowers the target’s durability by 500 points, At max level, it can ignite the enemy base. The mine lasts 24-hour, cooldown 72 hours. You can store up to 2.

skill50_3.tooltip: Protector's Oath. Instantly obtain 30 (up to 100) highest level Desert Protectors. Cooldown: 71.5 hours

skill45_1.tooltip: Drone Supply. Use this item to get a level 1 Engineer skill reward (better rewards at higher levels). Cooldown: 23.5-hour.

skill45_2.tooltip: Fearless Defense. When defending the base, a proportion of the attacking units will be killed based on the level and number of your fallen units +1% (up to 5%)

skill45_3.tooltip: Shrinking Spell. When Desert Protectors defeat an enemy base, they reduce the visual size of the target base by 10% stacking up to 5 times.

skill40_1.tooltip: Medical Aid. Choose an Ally to use. After use, both yours and their Hospital’s Capacity increase by 10% (up to), lasting for 240 minutes, cooldown 71.5 hours (effects do not stack)

skill40_2.tooltip: Buddy Shield. Activate a shield for 1 (up to 4) hours for yourself or an ally, with a 71.5-hour cooldown (effects do not stack)

skill40_3.tooltip: Fragile Spell. When Desert Protectors defeat an enemy base, they reduce the target base’s max durability by 1,000 (up to 5000)

skill35_1.tooltip: Resource Saving. Reduce resources cost for building construction.

skill35_2.tooltip: Recycling. Reduce resources cost for research

skill35_3.tooltip: Double Greenification. Greenification now covers a larger area per use (1×1 to 3×3)

skill30_1.tooltip: Cooperative Construction. Boost building speed by 10% (up to 20%) for both you and a selected ally for 60 minutes, with a 23.5-hour cooldown (effects do not stack).

skill30_2.tooltip: Cooperative Research. Boost research speed by 10% (up to 20%) for both you and a selected ally for 60 minutes, with a 23.5-hour cooldown (effects do not stack)

skill30_3.tooltip: Sands Protection. While within the Alliance Center’s range, defending heroes in your base gain extra Defense

skill25_1.tooltip: Siege Inspiration. Increased Profession EXP from damaging City Durability

skill25_2.tooltip: Friendly Aid. When reinforcing an ally’s base, the casualty rate of the Drill Ground’s units decreases (not stackable)

skill25_3.tooltip: Professional Insights. Use to instantly gain 2% (up to 10%) of your current level’s Profession EXP, up to a maximum of 100,000, with a cooldown of 23.5 hours.

skill20_1.tooltip: Rally Rush. Joining or returning with rallies boosts troop marching speed

skill20_2.tooltip: Siege Banner. Set up “Siege Banner” on an empty tile. Increases the Durability Damage of allies whose bases are within the banner’s range by 100 , lasting 30 minute, cooldown 71.5 hr (stack up to 5 times).

skill20_3.tooltip: Double Conversion. Enhance your efficiency in helping allies convert Protectors

skill15_1.tooltip: Build Now. Use it to immediately reduce all Construction Queue time by 120 minutes (based on level), cooldown 48 hours.

skill15_2.tooltip: Research Now. Use it to immediately reduce all Research Queue time by 120 minutes (based on level), cooldown 48 hours

skill15_3.tooltip: Free Teleport. Gain one free Advanced Teleport chance every 71.5 hours, up to 1 (up to 3) stored at a time.

skill10_1.tooltip: Build for Free. Increase free speed-up time for Constructions. Levels: Level 1: 48, Level 2: 96, Level 3:144, Level 4: 192, Level 5: 240

skill10_2.tooltip: Research for Free. Increase free speed-up time for research. Levels: Level 1: 48, Level 2: 96, Level 3:144, Level 4: 192, Level 5: 240

skill10_3.tooltip: Double Exchange. Exchange two types of seasonal resources ad 1:2 ration, consuming 15.000 (based on level) and gaining 30.000 (based on level), with a cooldown of 48 hours. Levels: Level 1: 5.000, Level 2: 15.000, Level 3: 25.000

skill5_1.tooltip: Extra Meal. The effect of Daily Freebie for stamina has been improved.

skill5_2.tooltip: Siege Mastery. Unit durability damage increases by 100 (based on level)

skill5_3.tooltip: Building Inspiration. Unit durability damage increases by 100 (based on level)

skill1_1.tooltip: Rapid Production. Use it to immediately gain 4 hours (based on level) of production from in-base Food, Iron and Coin buildings, cooldown 24 hours.

skill1_2.tooltip: Outstanding Contribution. Donating Tech helps increase the number of Alliance Contribution points earned (without affecting Contribution Score).

skill1_3.tooltip: Combat Experience. Increased Profession EXP from killing monsters on World Map. Level 1: 20%, Level 2: 40%, Level 3: 60%
